alert.note: Alert for Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 19 at 6:15PM PDT by NWS Hanford
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT SOUTHWESTERN MADERA AND WEST CENTRAL FRESNO COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM PDT... At 614 PM PDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Cantua Creek, or 32 miles southwest of Madera, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mendota, Cantua Creek, San Joaquin, and Panoche Road. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.

area.areaDesc: Caruthers - San Joaquin - Selma; Los Banos - Dos Palos; Merced - Madera - Mendota; West Side of Fresno and Kings Counties
